name: Forest (Rasmus Clausen)
description:
You are the forest god, trying to grow your forest, but a sickness has spread through the land, and is infecting your trees. cut the connections to the decease filled trees and burn them. Do your best to control the forest

Rules:
when a tree is infected or on fire it will spread through it's roots to other trees

you get point from the health trees
while the infected trees takes your points
remember to burn the infected trees

How to play:
you have 3 abilities
connect trees:
by connecting trees you can control the flow of the fire 
to hit all the infected trees

Cut Roots:
by cutting the roots you make sure infection and fire doesn't spread,

Fire:
you can use fire to destroy infected trees but beware it also burns health trees
¨
